name: Neighbourhood Journey
description:
A kid plays around in his back yard. This is a game about fantasy, exploration and imagination. A home is wherever you can have fun, play and create your own journey!

'Better Days' and 'Epic ' - https://www.bensound.com/

gezortenplotz - Desert Eagle sound - Adapted - https://freesound.org/people/gezortenplotz/sounds/19515/

SpartanX109 - Desert Eagle sound - Adapted - https://freesound.org/people/SpartanX109/sounds/89147/

thecheeseman - Hurt - Adapted - https://freesound.org/people/thecheeseman/sounds/44428/

FlechaBr - Short Monster Roar - Adapted - https://freesound.org/people/FlechaBr/sounds/340162/

Michel88 - Painb - https://freesound.org/people/Michel88/sounds/76965/

Voice: Nina Utby
